title: What is CanaKit in Raspberry Pi? - Quora

response.answer_text: What is CanaKit in Raspberry? CanaKit is a company that provides a lot of electronic kits. They include a kit with the Raspberry Pi that has the rated power supply, case, breadboard circuit board for experiments, and connecting ribbon between the breadboard and the Pi that supplies the GPIO signals, LEDs, and resistor packs, breadboarding wires… Contact Us

In-short I can say… The Raspberry Pi can be described as an affordable, mini size single board computer which plugs into the computer monitor or the TV, and uses the standard keyboard, and mouse. It’s a capable little unique device which enables people of all ages to conveniently explore computing, and easily learn how to properly program in languages such as Python and Scratch. It is capable of doing every single thing you would expect from a desktop computer, from web browsing and playing high definition videos, to word processing, making spreadsheets, and playing games.
